about_the_game:
Wizkid is a 2.5D side-scrolling platformer in which you fill the boots of a brave young wizard, traversing the halls of a worn castle. You must courageously dodge traps, spring over lava, dig through chambers that have sat undisturbed for eons, solve puzzles that have stumped the sages of old, all to gather the rare items for the powerful spell that should allow you to vanquish the dragon which has plagued your homeland once and for all! Items that shall endow you with powers never before seen in this action-adventure-puzzle-platformer for the ages!

But you better hurry before the dragon grows impatient! Lest you are denied five minutes more.

Featuring hand-drawn characters and items, carefully sculpted models, placed in a beautifully lit Unreal environment, set by enthralling ambient music and effects, Wizkid will relight a forgotten imagination with a pang of nostalgia and humor.

Also tacos.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor running at 2.5 GHz or faster.
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 compatible graphics card with the latest drivers.
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor running at 3.5 GHz or faster.
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 12 compatible graphics card with the latest drivers.
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: Dodge deadly blades and leap over terrifying pitfalls to unearth reality-bending artifacts and spells as the Wizkid! Explore an enormous castle and delve into its labyrinthine dungeons in this side-scrolling platformer adventure where you must ultimately face an enemy beyond imagination.
